product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies BlastMatch Fire Starter
long_description: The BlastMatch(TM) fire starter from Ultimate Survival Technologies generates three times the heat of a standard match. Designed for all-weather use, the BlastMatch performs well in marine, arctic, desert and jungle environments. Spring-loaded flint bar rotates 360deg to help prevent uneven wear. Tungsten carbide striker is built into the thumb button, allowing simple one-handed operation; user must press button to engage the striker. If the BlastMatch gets wet, simply wipe it off and it's ready for use. Compact size lets you easily pack the BlastMatch on every adventure.
short_description: The BlastMatch(TM) fire starter from Ultimate Survival Technologies generates three times the heat of a standard match.
